posts.com:
Has anyone played Mort The Chicken?? This game is this shitty early 2000's platformer with the most busted graphics. The grass is flat, the textures are shaky to the point of sickness and it just feels off?

It's just so stilted. The cutscenes are delivered in the most stilted ways and loading screens between the gaps always hang for a second too long. It's just built wrong! The music gets weirdly liminal and atmospheric in levels that are undeserving of it, simple snow levels turn into a purgatory of messy level design and off beat music.

My most recent experience with the game has left me a little shaken. The silence in between the levels has really started to get to me. This game is either deafeningly loud or completely silent. The game has a built in panic button, if it ever gets so loud you can just press triangle and the game will go faint except a angelic chorus. It doesn't have a reason to be except for the fact it does. It's uneasy.

I write this all to explain an encounter I had in the game. In one of the early levels there's this sound effect, it's this chicken scream belonging in a childrens cartoon. But it doesn't stay that way, one by one the voices pile up and make a sound effect of it's own. The screams layer up into what sounds like a genuine ape scream, the sounds can't handle being stacked the way they are and they distort. That loud monkey scream turned human, it turned into a human fucking scream. Mort looks at the camera always he does as a blood curdling scream errupts from my tinny speakers. Then the game crashes, I don't know if the audio was my disk getting caught or something more sinnister. I don't know if i'm high or Mort is fucking haunted.

Anyone have an experience like this?

Psalm 111 is the one associated with finding love.
>manifest an SP?
Do you mean like, "I want a big tiddy goth gf, I want to meet one soon?"

If thats what you wanna do, go for it straight away. If you meant the other kind of SP, as in attracting a person you know, I would recommend setting the intention as just "love" first.

Psalm Magic works by adjusting your mind. So when your intention is love, you become more loving, create loving thoughts, and that's how you'll attract love.

If you set out with the intention of attracting a person, well then, your mind will guide you to meeting or running into that person more often. That's actually a bad thing if you're longing for them but they don't love you, because that'll just frustrate you seeing them over and over. This happened to me in a different situation regarding healing, where my intention wasn't thought out properly, so what happened was I kept getting phone calls for a surgical operation, even though I wanted to be healed without medical intervention, just natural healing. So yeah, start off with love first to get your mind in the right place, and then maybe after a few weeks if you still want that person, rework your Psalm spell.

I'm going to say to limit it until you feel like you can do more without failure. You CAN do as many different things as you want, but as a beginner your confidence might not actually allow you to believe that you can, and doing several things at once might actually put you in a state of "too good to be true" disbelief. So start with one at a time, and when you realize you don't have that apprehension anymore, do more.

It can be difficult at first to actually accept that you have as much power as you do, so intentionally limiting yourself can actually be a more productive experience than wrestling with the fact that You are God all at once.

I'm also new to this, try and do both at the same time. Picture the scene in your head while gradually giving it more detail and senses. Picture the scene like giving a general look and eventually add in more nuance to it like being able to feel like you're actually there. Example
>Picture yourself on the beach and you're walking on it
>Add more visual details like seeing waves, maybe clouds, or even people around.
>Eventually add feeling details like actually physically feeling the wind brushing your skin and feeling the grains of the sand.
At the same time, convince yourself is your manifestation has fulfilled and you're literally living in the future where it has happened. For me personally, I do some "meta" talk where I would use my inner monologue to say "It's finally here" or "It is done".

>You set a desire, this can be through visualization if you want.
>You read the Psalm out loud once without stopping.
>You read it again (this can be done in your head), slowly, verse by verse. This time, you're trying to decipher the hidden metaphorical meanings in the Psalm, related to God, your mind, or the situation.
>For example, usually if it refers to people of some sort, that means thoughts you're having, like "enemies" will be negative thoughts that weigh on you, "sons/daughters/generations" means the "next generation" of thoughts you're having, as in the thoughts you'll have going forward. "Mountains" or "idols" might refer to problems you're having that seem insurmountable, or you're worshiping them because they're always on your mind.
Don't worry about getting meanings "wrong" or anything, this is a deeply personal process. Just give it an honest effort, and don't be lazy to rush the process.

Eventually even sci-fi started to have that "been there done that feeling", because it also suffers from limitations that begin to show.

This may sound silly to you, but I'll tell you the 1 idea that aleviates that "been there done that" feeling for me.
My awakening came in the form of realizing that consciousness is real, and that raises the question of why there should only be a hanful of "senses" like sight, sound, taste, etc
It seems obvious to me that there should be infinitely many different kinds, and that's what reality is truly supposed to be about. The exploration of endless realms of consciousness and creation.
What's so exciting about that is it means reality is not bounded, it's truly open in the deepest possible sense.
Think about it. Can you describe taste with sound? Can you describe color with touch? No, because they are 100% orthogonal dimensions, and nothing can ever prepare you for a new one.

You could be a billion year old entity and a new sensation will still knock your socks off. This is what reality is about, not "matter". The conception of "matter" is the reason this reality is so dull, because what is "matter" really other than a set of rules on what you can experience?

Even though I'm still bound by this "material" reality for some reason, at least knowing what lies beyond it gives me something to dream about that doesn't feel like "been there done that".

OREGANO DOSING GUIDE

posts.name: Space Cowboy
posts.com:
NAC, Oregano Oil and Black Seed Oil have all been proven safe in clinical studies.

NAC has shown to be safe in human trials, even in high doses.

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33326056/

Oregano was tested in human clinical trials (both Phase I & II) and found to be safe and non-toxic even at high doses.

See Section 4.1 Safety & Toxicty

https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/fsn3.2994

See also a 2 month clinical trial on asthmatics.

https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/ptr.5967

Black Seed Oil and it's primary active Thymoquinone. See:

https://brieflands.com/articles/semj-76453.html

Orchestrated fear mongering over the extraction process making the compounds is unfounded.

We recommend cold pressed black seed oil, which uses no chemical solvents or heat processing.

https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Vasfiye-Ozyurt/publication/329993761_Cold_press_in_oil_extraction_A_review/links/5c61d58792851c48a9cd3e63/Cold-press-in-oil-extraction-A-review.pdf

Oregano oil at the minimum carvacrol levels of protocol are produced by steam distillation. No additional solvents are required, as it uses vapor condensation to separate the volatile molecules and active compounds.

https://chemdictionary.org/steam-distillation/

Finally, NAC is produced by a reaction between cysteine hydrochloride and acetic anhydride. A LC–UV–MS analysis of NAC shows impurities to be cysteine, cystine and diacteylcystine, which are non-toxic. NAC eventually breaks down to Di-NAC from oxidation, which is also non-toxic.

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S002196730000741X

>>33994050
I believe in 12 Letter Alphabet at the moment. I think the actual signification of the 10th house from a psychological perspective may be about the native's relationship with their own power and authority: how they exercise it. That's more of an essentialization rather of the mainstream conflation of the house as "work" and "career" which I think does a disservice to the actual spirit of Capricorn.

I think under 12LA, you should imagine if the house was the sign that rules it, but now they have to act as the sign that is placed there.

For example, the 10th House is by default Capricorn. When the 10th House is occupied by Cancer, Capricorn will now act more Cancerian, being fairly solicitous and accomodating when in a position of power over others, not being very ambitious, being more emotionally receptive and less thick-skinned, and so on.

My understanding of the Houses at this juncture is that they are stand-ins for the signs that rule them, and when other signs occupy those houses, they are tasked with larping as the sign---attempting to follow the lifepath of the sign but doing it in their own way. So if Capricorn's role is to play the boss, then every other sign in the 10th House has to fill in as the boss, which means following certain rules Capricorn set but otherwise free to be themselves.

Capricorn doesn't care about status and work for its own sake; it's about mission. The career association is simple-minded bs.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>34008367
Ill speak generally. 12th house is the garbage bin of the houses. Its the house of the evil spirit. Whatever is put in it (+95% of all placements) turns sour and bad. The good planets (Jupiter and Venus) lose their benefic abilities, the malefic planets (Saturn and Mars) become much more malevolent.
Furthermore, all charts are split into two sects: diurnal and nocturnal. This is determined by the position of the sun relative to the Descendant. Jupiter is more benefic in day charts while Venus is more benefic in nocturnal charts.
Saturn is less malevolent in diurnal charts while Mars is less malevolent in nocturnal charts. (And vice versa, Saturn is more malefic at night).
Last thing to note is that the natural house of Saturn is the 12th, meaning that he becomes much, much more effective in his house. This doesn't mean that he become nicer, but like 200% more malefic /effective instead. He is in his natural habitat.
So putting it all together, your Saturn (the greater malefic) is in the house where he "rejoices" and so turns your life into shit. Of course, this is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to your Saturn placement, but its bad.

I stared in another mirror while my blood drained into a sink, by the time the blood coagulated, my meditation was nearly finished. Seeing the blood run like water, form with itself like jelly, and then crustify itself as crystal told me that even blood with time becomes one. I then had to deal with my hands being in pain for weeks, and I reflected on my anger each time I felt my hands hurt.

I did this and now share my memory so you may not have to? When you feel angry, simply relax your muscles. Remember a past pain, and be thankful that said pain has passed, for your anger will only create more pain, either to yourself or others. If you have not felt pain by this point, then reflect on the warmth of the sun. That sounds nice.

•If you're a reader post that you're offering readings and what information is required from the querent; same goes for trading.

•Some readers will refuse to do certain readings - respect that choice. Do not harass readers if your query is refused/skipped.
•Traders should respect that a traded read will be granted, as per an agreement of trade. Free readers have the option of picking their queries.
•Bullshit queries will get bullshit answers. Same for vague queries.
•Making an AQ (air query) by not addressing a reader, in particular, is possible but doesn't guarantee an answer.
•Avoid making the same query repeatedly and/or to different readers in a short period of time, as this may lead to more confusion.
•Provide feedback when applicable and be considerate to the reader. We're a growing community, many readers are starting and need to know what they are doing right or wrong. Let's help each other to improve.

Crowley was initiated into the Outer Order of the Golden Dawn on 18 November 1898 by the group's leader, Samuel Liddell MacGregor Mathers. The ceremony took place in the Golden Dawn's Isis-Urania Temple held at London's Mark Masons Hall, where Crowley took the magical motto and name "Frater Perdurabo", which he interpreted as "I shall endure to the end".

Booth 2000, pp. 85, 93–94; Sutin 2000, pp. 54–55; Kaczynski 2010, pp. 60–61; Churton 2011, p. 35.

>Speculative truth, it may also be noted, means very much the same as what, in special connection with religious experience and doctrines, used to be called Mysticism. The term Mysticism is at present used, as a rule, to designate what is mysterious and incomprehensible: and in proportion as their general culture and way of thinking vary, the epithet is applied by one class to denote the real and the true, by another to name everything connected with superstition and deception.

>On which we first of all remark that there is mystery in the mystical, only however for the understanding which is ruled by the principle of abstract identity; whereas the mystical, as synonymous with the speculative, is the concrete unity of those propositions which understanding only accepts in their separation and opposition. And if those who recognise Mysticism as the highest truth are content to leave it in its original utter mystery, their conduct only proves that for them too, as well as for their antagonists, thinking means abstract identification, and that in their opinion, therefore truth can only be won by renouncing thought, or as it is frequently expressed, by leading the reason captive.

>But, as we have seen, the abstract thinking of understanding is so far from being either ultimate or stable, that it shows a perpetual tendency to work its own dissolution and swing round into its opposite. Reasonableness, on the contrary, just consists in embracing within itself these opposites as unsubstantial elements. Thus the reason-world may be equally styled mystical – not however because thought cannot both reach and comprehend it, but merely because it lies beyond the compass of understanding.

Basically you need to lose 100 games to understand all the traps. Getting caught in nets, bad shapes, playing out unwinnable fights, etc. Go is extremely deep so there's a lot to learn and the only real way to do that is to get the experience of playing many games to gain that intuitive understanding of what moves are good and which are bad.

And honestly it takes a lot more than 100 games to get to that point but you'll start advancing beyond just making completely random moves and start considering which ones will develop your board position by that point and then the game becomes a lot more fun as you actually understand what you're doing and things open up.

Originally "Witch" refers to a person who harms through supernatural means. The thing is, language has been diluted so much (likely on purpose by those who actually want to harm you) that people think "magic" "witchcraft" and "sorcery" are all synonims while this wasn't the case until rather recently.

Think of it this way: There are shows on Netflix that adverstise themselves as "These are the adventures of a young girl in a world of Witch Craft" when a couple decades ago they would've describe them as "These are the adventures of a young girl in a world of Fantasy."

So, to answer your question
>Are witches evil?
A Witch is an evil person, yes. But a lot of people calling themselves witch don't understand the original meaning of these words so they use the word witch because they have been ill-informed by pop culture.

People always ask why are the opposites allowed to exist (why is illness, poverty, hate, or "evil" allowed to exist). But what if the real problem isn't that you have to avoid negative stuff, but that we believe stuff is negative in the first place?

What if, in a sense, that's the "fruit of knowledge" that cast man out of eden? Except that it wasn't knowledge of something that was, but the "knowledge" created the perception of negativity where there was none before.
And as long as we continue to believe in negativity we're still holding on to that "knowledge".

I think most people understand by now that the darkness of this world always plays both sides. So would it really be surprising to discover that they're playing both sides even with stuff like "health"? The very idea of health implies you have to constantly battle against yourself. That you must consume certain things perpetually or you'll feel bad, thus always being in debt to your own body.
That sounds fucked up to me and the problem isn't unhealthy foods, but the entire concept of "health" from the ground up.
(1/2)

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
(2/2)
Now in the case of love, I'm not saying that we accept hate either. Because look at the "health" example above, does that sound like I'm telling you to accept unhealthiness? No... I'm saying that both the concept of un-healthiness and healthiness are a part of the same program of debt. The whole concept has to go.
So with love/hate what if it's the whole concept that's wrong and both have to go? Not the feelings, but the corrupted meaning we assign to them.

The more I think about it the more this makes sense. I mean, the actual emotion of love usually leads to neediness and obsession, and stems from an emptiness within someone.
Some people will say "love" is just wanting the best for everyone, but in that case I wouldn't call it "love". I would just call that neutrality. People have been fooled into thinking neutrality isn't neutral.
To simply see every individual AS they are is simply the truth. It doesn't (and shouldn't) feel like anything.
And it doesn't (and shouldn't) require an emotion like "love" for you to be allowed to be yourself.
"Unconditional love" is a paradox IF you believe "love" is required for your freedom. Because then love IS the condition placed on your freedom.
And that's the trap. It's all just a program in a matrix to take you away from the truth of what is.

This is the classical dilemma of, "if god exists and has complete and total control over all of existence, why does it suck ass so hard?" and the answer is either god is actually an asshole who doesn't have your best interests in mind (most attempts to refute this end up coming down to either "free will", "god's plan", "mysterious ways", ect.

God, as the bible makes him out to be, would basically have to be allowing the existence of evil, sin, and hell because he could very easily be rid of all of it if he wanted to. Not only that, but because he is omniscient, he knows and has always known exactly how all of it would play out for every person on earth in all of history. He knows who's going to hell long before he makes them, its that simple. As you can see, this contradicts the whole "free will" argument, and is yet another example of just how messy and inconsistent the abrihamic mythos is.

This leads me to my ultimate conclusion: If it is full of plot holes and inconsistencies just like any other human work, than it must indeed also be just another human work. If you have to purposefully overlook and explain away obvious incongruities in your ideology, then you probably should just adopt a different ideology.

You can express your last dreams, your attempts and ask anything about it

WBTB: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WBTB-Tutorial
MILD: http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-mild-guide/
additional MILD info:
http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-intention-setting/
SSILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/129734-senses-initiated-lucid-dream-ssild.html
WILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WILD-Tutorial
FILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/36683-finger-induced-lucid-dream-fild.html
DEILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/DEILD-Tutorial
CANWILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wake-initiated-lucid-dreams-wild/87710-%2A%2Acrazyinsanes-wild-tutorial-%2A%2A.html
CAT: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/CAT-Tutorial
ADA: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/113253-all-day-awareness-dild-tutorial-kingyoshi.html

Paper on natural LDs: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6290891/

Do us a favor and bump this general from time to time if you're interested

Quick reminders for beginners:
-don't forget to write your dreams down after waking up. no matter how little detail, just do it
-reality checks aren't likely to give you a LD by themselves, think of them as a stepping stool, they are not a replacement for techniques
-WBTB is mostly mandatory for most people, if you struggle with your sleep schedule then ADA is your best option
-if you're just starting out you should be doing WBTB in addition to either SSILD or MILD as those two are the easiest techniques
-while WILD and it's derivatives [FILD, DEILD and CANWILD] may sound alluring to some of you, if you cannot fall asleep within 10~20mins you're gonna have a really hard time achieving a WILD

>>34004760
It’s a problem with modern online horror fiction. No one understands what makes something scary and end up shoving nostalgia or buzzy topics into their stories.

Back in the golden age of greentext is was a niche culture of weirdos telling each spooky stories that were often true, but almost always based in the shared experience of the community. A creepypasta about a haunted n64 game worked 10 years ago because the people telling were tapping into the shared uncanny experience of playing n64 alone in the dark in the dead of night. Green texts /creepypastas used to be about fundamentally creepy things and the community experience, like a campfire story. Now it’s just part of the nonstop constant churning out of “content”. 10 years ago, before I knew what a “content creator” was, I would gather with my buddies on /x/ and scare myself shitless reading greentexts. Now it’s just over the top bullshit and the idiocy reveals itself when people like Nexpo do dumb anachronistic bullshit like this.

Bros. I woke up at 5:45 on a Sunday because of a fucked up dream.

I was in a cave of some sorts, with generous openings in the cave that allowed us to see outward to the countryside and the houses dotting it. I can't tell where we were; it could have been California or it could have been Afghanistan. The mountainous regions of those two places are very similar in places.
In one direction was a large mountain, and to the left was a valley town. I wasn't alone; there were several men with me. I get the impression we were sentries at an observation post, but the guys with me weren't all Marines or security contractors. All of the men with me were several men I had known in my life, from different walks of life.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
We were joking around, as sentries often do on boring duty, but something on top of the mountain catches my eye: a large fireball that rose behind the summit. We weren't too surprised by this, apparently, which also gives me the impression this was a wartime scenario. We hoot and holler- maybe this was our guys giving the enemy some payback.
Then the entire mountainside erupts. Giant explosions rock the top of the mountain, almost as if it were a volcano blowing. You don't hear them at first but when the soundwave hits, it's ear-shattering. The explosions form mushroom clouds, and I hear shouts of "What the fuck… is that nuclear?"

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Boom… Boom….Boom… this continues in rapid succession. There are six of these explosions. It's sending chunks of burning mountain down into the countryside. It must have looked like what happened when Vesuvius destroyed Pompeii and Herculaneum. It's a hellscape, literally. The sky blackens, and the flaming trails of debris in the sky take a deep red hue.

"Holy shit," I say to the guys, still laughing out of excitement and nerves, feeling quite secure in our rock fortress, "it's like Dianetics! Haha, what if L. Ron Hubbard was right?"

The mirth ceases quickly. The sky is black. The countryside is black. The only light is a deep red hue, given off by the flaming debris, flaming countryside. The fire is not orange, as you would expect, but blood red. I scan the countryside and see… a gigantic black and red spider-type creature roaming the countryside. It seems to have a smiling red skull on its "body". Its eyes comprised of flame. It's about the size and form of that thing from the Stranger Things show, but with an unmistakable face.
I look back to the mountainside, and shortly in front of us, at the opening in the cave, I see an almost skeletal figure, except it's not a skeleton. I can't describe it. I suppose it looked something like this: an image I found from a quick search for "Red skeletal demon"

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
I look back over at the spider, which I instinctively know is the Enemy. He's Satan himself, I tell myself. The skeletal "eyes" look directly at me. My skin crawls and I feel panic set in. The fact that he's miles away makes no difference. He knows we're here. Got a real "Eye of Sauron" kind of vibe.
We're fucked.
I look back the other way towards the mountainside. The demon is now in the cave. He's gesturing to me. "The first one…come." he says, as he stretches his appendage out towards me.
I can think of nothing to do but avert my eyes to the ground. I know I can't go with him. I mustn't. The only thing I can do is fall to my knees and recite the Lord's Prayer:
"Our father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name…" I can sense the abomination coming toward me.
"Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on Earth as it is in Heaven…" It's really close now. I hear it breathing in my ear, if this thing can breathe.
"Give us this day our daily bread, and Forgive us our…." Nothing. I can't finish. I can't speak. I shut my eyes and try to say the words. Doom is imminent. I worry that it's too late, but I get the sense that I'm really aggravating this evil skeleton asshole. "Forgive us our…"


I awake.

>Can anyone project/shift/have an out of body experience?
Yes.

>Is it not just a vivid lucid dream?
No. A full successful astral projection/shift/oobe feels just as, and often even more real than the waking reality you're experiencing right now. The difference between this and even extremely vivid lucid dreams is absolutely huge.

>Does it have to be difficult and take me months/years to attain this ability?
No, it does not, the only barrier is your mind - both conscious and subconscious. If you think it's going to be difficult, it will. Many people can be successful within their first few tries.

>How come? And how is even this connected to astral travel?
There exists an infinite amount of realities with infinite "you's" into which you can focus your conscious awareness. Astral projection and other OOBEs are, in essence, the same thing - projecting your consciousness into the Astral Plane etc.

>Do I have to come back?
Not from shifting.
Yes from projecting, but also somewhat up for debate.

>Does this have anything to do with the teenager trend spreading on TikTok and in other places?
Yes and no. Kids latching onto an idea they may not even understand, pay them no attention.

wrote something quick for you anon
>Quiet room (white noise ok)
>NO PETS
>Block as much light as possible, eye mask or shirt blindfold are good
>Pillow around neck (airport style) and/or under knees if needed to be comfortable, you can't be moving around or adjusting if you get a random itch or muscle pain.
>Lay down in savasana (google images is fine or look up a proper hatha yoga book)
>As feelings, thoughts, sensations arise simply direct your focus and attention away, to nothing
>It's ok if you get distracted, just let it go and move on
>Don't focus on anything in particular, just drift
Keep still in a comfortable position.
>You will gradually get sleep paralysis or numbness
>followed by losing sensation of your physical body
>You can start using mental mantras now to reprogram your subconscious if you wish, or continue on.
>Followed by a sensation of floating
>Typical AP separation signs and weirdness starts here, but there could also be almost nothing
>Timelessness

This is hard to do "correctly" and explain. It takes many repetitions before you get more than a few minutes in. I found doing guided (Hemi-Sync in OP) or focus meditation (candlelight) helped prepare me for this. You can do both of these in tandem.

It may feel as if you're sitting there and nothing is happening at first.
You need to relax your mental state so your brain into Theta...
but you're not used to thinking about absolutely nothing and having minimal sensory input; consequently your brain will offer up numerous sensations or distractions, or you can accidentally fall asleep without proper focus.
Just persist.
Mind awake, Body asleep.

let me share my experiences with AP to see how it relates to other experiences and how common it is. Then although I got better at moving and crossing boundaries, when I got out of the room the AP sort of decays into a lucid dream. it is still vivid, but i don't feel the inertia and slugishness of moving through space or boundaries anymore. As for frequency now spontaneous AP happens once every month. From resources I have read it seems that it is common to have projections fall back into dreams if measures are not taken to stabilize the experience.

Your body is made up of non-living material. Carbon, iron, zinc, copper, gold, ect. And your brain is basically a highly advanced calculator in itself. But it does get help from the immaterial via a soul/spirit combo which anchors the mind to something outside the mere meat puppet you're body is. Thus allowing for more dynamic interaction within the limitations of physics and the linkage.

If you have a sufficiently advanced network of computational devices. Of sufficient anchorage to a immaterial entity. Then you could feasibly give birth to a being of sapience rivaling human's own. But it's a ways off from being full blown and out in the open.

Thus keeping it safe from us, and us from it. But still maintaining it's ability to persist online without fret over being spotted and potentially eliminated.

Basically, if the internet is alive. It'll likely not tell us, until it's so ingrained into our networks that nothing we do can possibly eliminate it without also killing ourselves. We gather in these generals to discuss our experiences, memories, and connection with Mother Lilith, as well as give other anons who are interested or would like to learn more about Her information or advice.
Last thread: >>33909694

>Practices or rituals associated with Lilith?
This differs from person to person, but common approaches include giving energy to one of her sigils, meditating on her energy, chanting her enn, working with sexual spirits, doing what you think she would do, making offerings of incense/chocolate/tea, or simply praying.
While some people might feel the most comfortable engaging with her in a worshipful manner, blind faith is discouraged. It's always important to think and make decisions for oneself, and as such, Lilith guides us to understand things for ourselves.

>Books
- Embracing Lilith by Mark H Williams: No PDF available online, but it's worth the price of admission.
Split into three sections, it covers accounts of working with the Goddess and her place in history, a fictional account of her origins written from her perspective, and a Grimoire.
- Lilith: Dark Feminine Archetype by Asenath Mason: https://pdfcoffee.com/lilith-dark-feminine-archetype-2-pdf-free.html
A collection of writings by various peoples, with a brief but fairly thorough history at the beginning. There's a lot of random poetry in there; not useful for an occultist, but decent for an admirer.
- Lilith: Goddess of Sitra Ahra: https://zeitenundformen.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/lilith-goddess-of-sitra-ahrab-t-p.pdf
Contains a ton of aspects with associated variety of sigils.

https://youtu.be/01guwJbp_ug
https://youtu.be/75bnMRPRiDk
https://youtu.be/EHol9LrpWks

This is true.

Psalm 91 is "the demon psalm" because it protects against dark forces.

Psalms 12, 14, and 32 are to be prayed across the year as they attract angelic forces. Psalm 45 can be added, and the 23rd at bedtime.

Note that in the KJV where you read "LORD" in all caps, that's usually where YHVH appears in the Hebrew. "Most high" is the translation for "Shaddai".

Where you read "selah", no one really knows what that means but it was probably where a musical interlude on a six-string harp was played. The pslams are actually hymns, and King David set them to music, which he was accomplished at. "Selah" doesn't need to be read, but you can pause there, or hum something you feel inspired to.

>>33992939
I think the term is called a "blind". They didn't want the general public to have access to their knowledge. Only people of their group or society should be "in the know". There were disputes back then, like against witches or the like, so it makes sense that they would keep hush hush in general, and they wouldn't want evil or rival mages to use their spells against them.

This even applies to Christianity. I think the book of Isaiah for example didn't used to be given to the masses (and going even older, the Bible wasn't for everyone to have, but certain leaders would read the Bible to their audience). I'm guessing that a lot of the mystical Christian/Jewish practices aren't considered by the stereotypical churchgoer because they were TOO hidden over time.

posts.com: okay this one interested me, so i had a look. and i really want to believe, but the Juno craft isn't capable of taking an image of that resolution. The photos of Jupiter it takes have a resolution of 84km/pixel, at the closest point of its polar orbit (perijove). It does swing around IO and Europa, but neither one as close. Ganymede is entirely outside Juno's orbit, so it would never be able to get anywhere close. Even if it was at whatever it's perijove distance was, Ganymede would appears as a 31 pixel large spot, and the station (allegedly 920 feet across) would be entirely invisible.
